subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth, 21, and Rory McIlroy, 26, are successful young golfers, but youth is rare in a sport that has been called slow, difficult and expensive by a younger generation.
snippet: Jordan Spieth, 21, and Rory McIlroy, 26, are successful young golfers, but youth is rare in a sport that has been called slow, difficult and expensive by a younger generation.
